items.sentence: Could you please speak a little more slowly?
Are you sure you want to cancel the meeting?
Please hold down the fort until we get back.
I see no reason why we can't start drinking.
Our family usually has turkey for Christmas.
It's almost always better to tell the truth.
I thought that that was very unprofessional.
You're taking a lot for granted, aren't you?
You're not the only one here from Australia.
Tom had no reason to suspect Mary was lying.
The police suspect Tom poisoned Mary's food.
I don't think that I can get along with Tom.
I don't think that I should do that for Tom.
I don't think that I like what Tom is doing.

I don't think Tom needs to do that for Mary.
I don't think Tom has to do that by himself.
I don't think I need to tell Tom what to do.
Tom has changed a lot since I first met him.
